title: Beef, Noodle and Chinese Mushroom Soup
ingredients: ['300g lean rump steak, thinly sliced', '150g buckwheat noodles', '150g shiitake mushrooms', '1.5 litre beef stock, made from cubes', '5 spring onions, chopped', '4 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '1 red chilli, finely chopped', '2 tbsp soy sauce', '1 tbsp fish sauce', '1 inch root ginger, grated', '1 tbsp olive oil']
